taskDescription: A small company has 3 divisions: Sales, Research and Development, and Manufacturing. One person from each division will be chosen to create an advisory board for the management group. If there are 8 people in Sales, 15 in Research and Development, and 48 in Manufacturing, how many different compositions of the advisory board are possible?
